Reviews.Title: “A lovely stay..”
Reviews.Author: Laura W
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel five days mother excellent stay arrived staff friendly welcoming admit redecoration dont affects quality anybodys trip enjoyed view vatican balcony comfortable clean breakfast selection food tasty evening meals reasonably priced location hotel quiet tad town wait 10 minutes bus metro easy routes city centre pretty simple hotel offers shuttle bus youre adventurous negotiating public transport overall thoroughly enjoyed stay definitely return thank

Reviews.Title: “Sightseeing trip to Rome”
Reviews.Author: Geraldine W
Reviews.Content: following sightseeing trip rome compliment friendly helpful staff stay hotel clean comfortable amenities food lovely continental breakfast plenty arrange packed lunch bonus sightseeingwe ate restaurant nights food reasonable comments little city main bus route quick ten minute trip bus vatican clean daily maid service fridge bonus balcony thoroughly enjoyed stay hotel thank

Reviews.Title: “A 2-3 stars hotels listed as 4 stars...”
Reviews.Author: marcelc
Reviews.Content: idea hotels 4 stars rating restoration poorly designed bathroom especially using toilet feet sink shower cabin sooo touch cold walls honestly speaking larger wouldnt fit shower cabin walls thin practically hear people talking doing door closing mechanisms pretty unique nowadays hard carpets floor provided slippers tea coffee options listed executive option plastic glasses day checked picked cleaning day replaced glasses available breakfast ok 12 days food everyday 1 type cheese 1 type ham 1 type salami type everyday annoying curiosity fruits breakfast vegetables mustard hotdogs fried bacon hotel pretty 20 mins metro 10 mins bus waiting 10 mins bus ride center rome pretty hard unless plan leave hotel morning night bad choice aspect staff helpful friendly overall bad choice aspects maybe dont else cheap night bring earplugs

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: kayledson
Reviews.Content: sisters stayed occasions palace cosmos tour expecting 4 star disappointed hotel suburb rome walking distance serviced bus taxis anyway basic terribly disappointed hear pretty breakfast anyway arrival tour 2 nights stay type upgrade superior introduced seventh heaven bedroom suites kingsize beds queen sized sofa 2 4 women travelling fantastic bathrooms excellent upgrade day expensive hotel staff obliging couldnt apparently updating hotel time money allows fore 7th heaven amazing views rome

Reviews.Title: “better than expected”
Reviews.Author: lulu3
Reviews.Content: stayed bus tour booked online advance rate werent expecting reading reviews trip advisor pleasantly surprised accommodations clean balconies careful shut patio doors patio door closes cant inside doors inside included breakfast reception friendly helpful arrived hotel late evening pleasantly surprised lobby restaurant willing 6 pizzas accommodating wouldnt hesitate stay

Reviews.Title: “Europe Tour Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tiger96_nz
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel due cosmos tour leaving found front desk service wasnt helpful inconvenience staff metro told 49 didnt tell sold tickets walking metro instead food town convenient stayed nights total

Reviews.Title: “Didnt stay through choice, but was very nice!”
Reviews.Author: TheWebsters4
Reviews.Content: originally booked hotel review transferred due booking arrived feeling bit fault raining heavy checked quickly lovely receptionist explained giving hotel apologised didnt walk shower honest drop luggage etc freshen rome didnt rome stay hotel day little outdated bathroom cobwebs walls looked rome bed comfy quiet corridor nights sleep walking day breakfast nice cooked continental didnt tea coffee etc nice didnt book choice found adequate walking rome day rest weary feet accommodation outskirts pretty standard pay lovely roman holiday

Reviews.Title: “Poorly designed bathrooms!”
Reviews.Author: olyottb
Reviews.Content: stayed night cosmos tour comfortable clean breakfast comment redesign bathrooms bathroom huge square washbasin overlapped toilet consequently person difficulty sitting toilet comfortably toilet bidet change washbasins ones

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”

Reviews.Content: location bus ride centre rome nice clean staff helpful noisy breakfast terrible lots tours time noisy staff couldnt demand

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing.”
Reviews.Author: t2243
Reviews.Content: stayed cosmos tour beginning stayed nights tour expecting modern classy hotel clean amenities required hotel location tourist attractions staff times friendly ot help bother serve food breakfast selection tasty internet expensive computer sloooow noise ridiculous times walls thin yell tell people outside door quieten stay recommend hotel dont expectations service location otherwise else

Reviews.Title: “I had the worst experience ever....”
Reviews.Author: tkanello
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 4 days dirty ants bad smell coming bathroom probobly sewer system breakfast ok staff mainly reception impolite center paid 1520 euro taxi lot noice hotel couldnt sleep 4 star hotel star travelling

Reviews.Title: “Very Basic, Far from City....but clean”
Reviews.Author: polotab
Reviews.Content: location bad rome city outside town basic didnt stay changed mind staying worse italy 2nd stay cosmos tour actually ok bottom line clean tolerate zero ammenities sanitary door locks confusing appeared broken busted lock door kicked breakfast plentiful huge banquet facilities accomodate guests tour overall ok grow person ive definitely stayed worse

Reviews.Title: “4 Star? Palace? No way!”
Reviews.Author: Ferrri
Reviews.Content: stayed cosmos trip appraisal forms handed clean breakfast ok slept fine definitely chosen stay rome walk metro chose taxi straight st peters unlikely cost taking cab nearest station cheaply poorly built didnt feel comfortable desk staff ignore customers chatted themselves internet expensive choice dont stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Cosmos should listen to their customers”
Reviews.Author: Credo505
Reviews.Content: stayed cosmos tour tour evaluation forms handed lots party departed immediately standard locationthe drab clean sound proofing nonexistent badly designed bathrooms toilet fitted partly hand arrival appeared aircon system overnight despite temperatures 35 degrees transport central rome difficult hotel courtesy bus goes morning late evening complicated bus stop bus connects metro party lost returning night found themselves dubious dark local eating establishment meal cold ordinary didnt arrive probably local supermarket bet breakfast horriblethe taste yoghurt indescribable bowl peaches obviously pineapple juice mystery solved pears added fresh start anyones guess internet charge huge stayed 3 star hotels europe 4 weeks worst company cosmos using poor facilities

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all costs”
Reviews.Author: pottertrotter
Reviews.Content: friends looking forward stay beautiful historical city mess easily staying hotel unbelievably central rome doesnt negative difficult transport links bus metro central fine coming buses stop hotel walk night creepy walls thin hear friends vice versa hear using toilet tmi opinion beds uncomfortable rate charge internet toilets dirty buffet breakfast isnt service hotel day hotel staff okay dont please tell theyll comprehend night time completely night staff lazy rude ignorant complacent downright annoying rant honestly travel lot budgets staying hostels tragedy hostel bed trumps hotel please heed advice avoid hope tour operators heed advice giving business people continuously ripped doesnt matter spend cheap wouldnt stay paid

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Vels79
Reviews.Content: travelled 11 month location liked hotel value money little difficult reach hotel ciampino airport bus stop walkable connects city center hotel offers shuttle service 3 euros city center thrice day breakfast clean bath renewed view stpeters basilica

Reviews.Title: “Noisy and staff unhelpful”
Reviews.Author: QPRgirl
Reviews.Content: read previous reviews bad star hotel wish listened night ok tired travelling night noise horrendous staff cold shoulder everytime tried talk speak acted bothering rid incorrect directions local buses church own rome beautiful near hotel hotel bus ride train ride central rome

Reviews.Title: “Quite far from central Rome”
Reviews.Author: verbalme
Reviews.Content: stayed cosmos tour 2009 reception staff friendly map directions central rome boredom pulled map started explaining expecting shower curtain didnt prevent water spilling onto bathroom floor complaint location located suburbs walk hotel bus interchange train alternatively express bus near hotel 5 10 mins walk takes directly central rome via vatican city 30 minutes central rome hotel slightly difficult bus goes street thankfully locals willing help
